meta.title: Sahana Nagendra Hosamani
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing software engineering work and technical expertise

about.bio: Detail-oriented and results-driven Software Engineer with over 3 years of professional experience. Specializing in the design, development, testing, and maintenance of robust software applications. Proficient in Agile methodologies, version control, and DevOps practices. Possess a strong foundation in full SDLC, problem-solving, and cross-functional collaboration. Currently pursuing a Masters in Computer Science at Oregon State University, seeking to apply technical expertise and passion for innovation in a fast-paced, growth-oriented environment to drive high-quality software solutions and contribute meaningfully to team success.
focus: Designing and implementing REST APIs for seamless system communication
Developing full-stack applications with optimized performance
Implementing CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed full-stack healthcare management applications, designed and tested REST APIs, and optimized database queries. Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies and Azure DevOps to deliver high-quality software solutions, improving user engagement and system performance.
achievements: Developed full-stack healthcare management applications using Angular, TypeScript, Django, and Python, improving user engagement by 20% and streamlining patient data workflows
Designed and tested REST APIs with authentication tokens, enabling secure integration with third-party systems and reducing response times by 10% through optimized endpoints
Conducted API testing using Postman, ensuring robust endpoint functionality and reliability
Optimized MongoDB and MySQL queries for large patient datasets, reducing execution time by 25% for real-time insights
Executed unit and end-to-end tests using Pytest, achieving 90% test coverage and reducing production defects by 10%
Leveraged Azure DevOps for sprint planning and CI/CD pipelines, accelerating deployment cycles by 15% and maintaining legacy applications

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Led the development of a full-stack inventory management system, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and built data visualization dashboards. Mentored interns and ensured seamless project delivery through Agile sprints and detailed documentation.
achievements: Developed a full-stack inventory management system using MERN stack, increasing operational efficiency by 30% through automated stock tracking
Built interactive dashboards using Qualtrics and D3.js, providing actionable insights for inventory forecasting and resource allocation
Engineered optimized algorithms for real-time data processing, reducing system latency by 25%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Ansible, and Jira, achieving 95% test coverage with Pytest and accelerating deployment cycles by 40%
Mentored 3 interns in Agile sprints, delivering training on Git and code quality, and ensured seamless project handovers with detailed documentation

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

certifications.name: Agile Fundamentals: Including Scrum and Kanban

publications.title: Hash Cracker Web App
publications.shortDescription: Full-stack web application to reverse engineer SHA-256 hashes, deployed on AWS with CI/CD pipelines.
description: Developed a full-stack web application using Next.js and Node.js to reverse engineer SHA-256 hashes.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for automated testing and deployment.
Deployed the application on AWS Elastic Beanstalk with Swagger API documentation for enhanced accessibility.
publications.impact: Provided a tool for secure hash analysis with automated deployment workflows

publications.title: Identification of hate material in code-mixed social media data using demographic and contextual information
publications.shortDescription: NLP research on detecting Hinglish hate speech using demographic and contextual analysis with custom embeddings.
description: Conducted research to detect hate speech in code-mixed Hindi-English (Hinglish) social media content.
Established lexical baselines using advanced NLP algorithms and custom embeddings for accurate detection.
Integrated demographic and contextual information to distinguish hate speech from general profanity.
features: Advanced NLP algorithms for hate speech detection
publications.impact: Enhanced social media safety through improved hate speech detection

publications.title: IndiaStack API for educational institutions
publications.shortDescription: MERN stack web and mobile apps integrating Digilocker API to streamline educational admissions.
description: Developed a MERN stack web application and mobile apps using Swift and Java to integrate IndiaStack's Digilocker API.
Streamlined admission processes for educational institutions by digitizing document verification.
Ensured cross-platform accessibility with secure document storage and real-time application tracking.
features: Digilocker API integration for document verification
Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android
publications.impact: Reduced admission processing time by 60% for educational institutions

publications.title: InterviewMate - AI-Powered Interview Preparation Platform
publications.shortDescription: Interactive voice-based interview preparation web app using AI voice agents and real-time feedback.
description: Developed a full-stack web application using Next.js and Firebase to simulate real-time voice-based mock interviews.
Integrated Vapi AI voice agents and Google Gemini for AI-generated questions and feedback with custom prompt engineering.
Designed a responsive, modern UI using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, ensuring cross-device compatibility.
features: Real-time voice interviews with Vapi AI voice agents
AI-generated custom interview questions based on role, level, and tech stack
AI-driven feedback on communication, technical skills, and problem-solving
User dashboard for managing and reviewing past interviews
Responsive UI for desktop and mobile devices
publications.impact: Enhanced job seekers' interview skills through realistic AI-driven practice and detailed feedback
